derivation: or קִרְיַת סֵפֶר; from H7151 (קִרְיָה) and a simpler feminine from the same as H5577 (סַנְסִן), or (for the latter name) H5612 (סֵפֶר); city of branches, or of a book;
outline:
Kirjath-sepher or Kirjath-sannah = "city of the book"
  1. a town in the mountains of Judah to the west of Hebron
strongs_def: Kirjath-Sannah or Kirjath-Sepher, a place in Palestine
